name: Reinterpretation of "Dream Caused by the Flight of a Bee around a Pomegranate a Second before Waking" #001
description: "Dream Caused by the Flight of a Bee around a Pomegranate a Second before Waking" oof, I lost my breath... That's one of the most famous paintings of Salvador Dali, which marks his return to his "paranoiac-critical method." In this reinterpretation, the art gains movements and creates a dialog between "The Persistence of Memory" (The melting clocks) when the tigers morph into clocks.
